excerpt: "Metaverses are clearly also ideal spaces to host virtual concerts, and 2020 was littered with examples of artists, their live shows stricken by coronavirus, leaping into virtual spaces to perform. These ranged from the super-enhanced playback event (Travis Scott’s hugely successful Fortnite gig) to full-blown live VR experiences in bespoke platforms like GranolaXR,"
